content.text: I have two passions: challenging myself and volunteering with my son's Boy Scout troop.
That is great! I am passionate about climbing, and volunteering with my dolls.
What kind of dolls do you have?
I have a lot of different types of dolls. I have a few Barbie dolls, some anime dolls, and some Beanie Babies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never been much of a doll person, but I can see how they could be relaxing.
Yeah, they definitely are. I love to read and write fiction, and I find that dolls are a great way to relax after a long day.
That's awesome! Do you have any specific hobbies that you like to do with your dolls?
I like to dress them up, play with them, and make them stories. I also like to take them on adventures.
That sounds like so much fun! I love to hear about people who are passionate about their hobbies.
Thanks! I'm glad that you're interested.
Me too! I think it's great that you have found something that you love to do.
Thanks! I think it's really important to have something that you can enjoy doing, no matter what.
